Articles.Content:
It's great that we can see the contracts in the hangar, flight and all.

However, I like to complete multiple contracts at a time, since there are a bunch you can do during a single flight.

Alas, I have yet to discover a way to organize the list, other than 'minimize' some of the contracts.

So when heading towards the orbit and trying to ensure the conditions are met for the ones I'm doing on the way before activating,

this leads to frantic scrolling up and down the list while trying to balance the speed and altitude and juggling with the stages.

So it would be great if we could bookmark some contracts and hide the rest. Also, drag and drop reordering the list would be fantastic as well. (And could be done with some modifier key, like ctrl, so that the regular dragging still acts like a scroll.)

Oh yes, I fully support this.

Myself I`d like an option to have an active list that showed all the contracts in order of preference for the ones with least amount of criteria still to be met. Maybe filter by contracts that have at least one criteria met. The top three would show what was still needed in an expanded form. Completed contracts would drop off the bottom.

The idea as proposed in the OP is one I like too.
